title: Source code of protocols of the Research Institute for Nature and Forest (INBO)
description: Source code of protocols used at the Research Institute for Nature and Forest (INBO), Brussels, Belgium. The protocols are written in R markdown and are compiled as html using the bookdown package. Website with compiled protocols (including older versions as well): https://protocols.inbo.be.
